method.name: SMOSSL Algorithm

reference.ref: Platt JC (1999) Fast training of support vector machines using sequential minimal optimization. MIT Press, Cambridge, MA

generalDescription.howWork: The SMO algorithm. It maps the original input space into a higher- dimensional feature space using a certain kernel function. In the new feature space, the SVM algorithm searches the optimal separating hyperplane with maximal margin in order to minimize an upper bound of the expected risk instead of the empirical risk. The SMO training algorithm obtains the SVM base classifiers
